data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 2
data.actual_result: It won't get closed automatically. It looks like you have no permission to edit it. Also opening the notification settings shows nothing.
data.expected_result: The overview/menu should automatically get closed after deleting.
data.short_description: Deleting channel/category while having its overview opened won't close this menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any channel or a category - Go to its setting overview (with channel topic, etc.) by editing the channel or category - Keep this section opened and go to a second device - Delete the channel or the category (that you have opened with your first device) with the second device - Go back to your first device and observe the channel or category overview
